creator: Argon Dev
descriptionHtml:
This app allows you to create shortcuts to quickly access the apps you use most frequently.

Features and Benefits

• Elegant and convenient popup window
• Material Design UI
• Super fast
• Easy to use

Other versions
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.argonremote.appdrawerplus

If you want to know more, please don't hesitate to email us at argondeviant@gmail.com

TAGS: App Shortcuts, App List, App Popup, Quick Drawer, Simple Drawer, Home Drawer, Floating Apps, Floating Drawer
